description: Try our easy to follow Thai-Flavoured Drumsticks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken drumsticks,High fibre,High protein,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Chicken,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: ThaiFlavoured Drumsticks Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Combine sauces, lime juice and sugar in a overnproof baking dish. Add half the mint to marinade mixture with drumsticks. Turn to coat.
Meanwhile, transfer baking dish to oven and cook for 30 minutes or until chicken is golden and cooked through.

Place noodles into a bowl and cover with boiling water. Stand for 5 minutes or until soft. Drain well and chop with scissors. Stir remaining mint into noodles with coleslaw. Serve chicken drumsticks with noodle salad and lime.
